data.name: Malefic World
data.desc: While this card is face-up on the field, you can activate this effect instead of conducting a normal draw during your Draw Phase. Choose 3 "Malefic" cards from your Deck and have your opponent pick 1 of them at random to add to your hand. Shuffle the rest back into your Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 3D Bonds Beyond Time Movie Pack
